list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a symmetrical three-dimensional shape, either solid or hollow, contained by six equal squares.
raise (a number or value) to its cube.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cube the deviations from the mean
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khối độ lệch so với giá trị trung bình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I bought sirloin from the butcher and cubed it myself
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã mua sirloin từ người bán thịt và tự nó
